inclusion.criterion: Ablation therapy with post dose scintigraphy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least one radioiodine bone uptake without structural correlation on high-resolution imaging
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A single radio iodine bone uptake with structural correlation on imaging
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of bone metastasis after a skeletal related event including spinal cord compression, pathological fracture, need for external beam radiation, surgery to bone, or development of hypercalcemia of malignancy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion and HPV 16 positivity. She is menopausal, smokes, and drinks alcohol frequently.
